entry.title: Heroku CLI on Windows cmd
entry.summary: Download and Heroku click installer visit https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/heroku-cli select 64 or 32 bit version next -> next -> … -> done Test if heroku is installed open cmd (or powershell) heroku --version possible output: Login to heroku heroku login redirect to web adress for login heroku CLI is logged now Enjoy heroku CLI c...

entry.title: Migrate Postgres database from Heroku to localhost

link.title: Migrate Postgres database from Heroku to localhost

entry.summary: This topic covers how to transfer data from the Postgres database of you application hosted on Heroku to your local machine. All commands are run in emulated Ubuntu under WSL2 on Windows 10. Just commands cd rails/project/repo/path sudo service postgresql restart rails db:drop rails db:drop DISABLE_DATABASE_ENVIRONMENT_CHECK=1 rails db:create rails db:migrate pg_restore --verbose --clean --no...
